title: Integrating Identity-Based Identification against Adaptive Adversaries in Federated Learning
summary: Federated Learning (FL) has recently emerged as a promising paradigm for privacy-preserving, distributed machine learning. However, FL systems face significant security threats, particularly from adaptive adversaries capable of modifying their attack strategies to evade detection.
